title: Dual effects of a bacteriocin-producing Lactiplantibacillus pentosus CF-6HA, isolated from fermented aloreña table olives, as potential probiotic and antimicrobial agent
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Hikmate Abriouel, Natacha Caballero Gómez, Julia Manetsberger, Nabil Benomar
